title: Can't Log in? Username and Password combination doesnt exist?
body:
Riot, i was so excited when Project Ashe came out, and my client was already experiencing difficulties before the project skins came out, "LoL Client not responding" in the most random of times. But now this is a bigger issue. I spent probably 300 dollars on this game throughout my whole League Career, and i was the idiot that clicked on that stupid link for "free rp and skins" And of course there was nothing. But as SOON as a bought PROJECT Ashe, I was about to start a game and show off the skin, and then i log out because it said someone else is logging in from another computer. **I DONT HAVE ANOTHER COMPUTER.** And once i tried to log back in its saying that I changed region, my password is changed, and idk where my league account is now

Plz riot fix this. I had over 5000 RP in my account, and god forbid someone is actually spending the money i spent.

replies.body: It sounds like someone else may be accessing your account.  I recommend going through the[ account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help regain access to the account.  Reach out to us in a[ support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our account team and look into this, and any issues that occurred as a result like the transfer.  We'll help you out!
